title: GPREC, Kurnool Ranking 2024 In India And World
meta_description: GPREC Overall ranking by India Today is 192 out of 281 colleges in India in 2023. GPREC B.Tech ranking by India Today is 192 out of 284 colleges in India in 2024 and it was 160 out of 246 colleges in India in 2023.
